name: fpx
description: Local development debugging interface for Hono apps, powered by OpenTelemetry

scripts.postinstall: pnpm run build:types && pnpm run build:source-analysis
scripts.build:embedded: pnpm --filter @fiberplane/playground build && rimraf packages/embedded/dist/playground && pnpm --filter @fiberplane/hono build && cp -r playground/dist packages/embedded/dist/playground
scripts.build:fpx-studio: pnpm clean:fpx-studio && pnpm build:api && pnpm build:frontend
scripts.build:lilo-frontend: pnpm --filter lilo-frontend build && cp -r lilo/lilo-frontend/dist lilo/lilo-worker/public
scripts.deploy:lilo: pnpm build:lilo && pnpm --filter lilo-worker run deploy
